headline: Kroger's Board of Directors Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: The Kroger Co.'s (NYSE: KR) Board of Directors today declared a quarterly dividend of 32 cents per share to be paid on June 1, 2025, to shareholders of record as of the close of business on May 15, 2025.
